resources.string: Do you want to see the app where the UI is created with Jetpack Compose or XML layout?
This can be changed at any moment in the settings.
Jetpack Compose is a modern Android UI toolkit by Google, designed to simplify and accelerate the development of native user interfaces with a declarative and component-based approach.

XML layout in Android is a markup language used to define the structure and appearance of user interfaces for Android apps, specifying the arrangement and properties of UI elements like buttons and text views within a parent layout. It allows developers to design and organize the visual aspects of their app\'s user interface.
I have been working since 2017 as an Android Developer. Proficient in turning an idea into a fully functioning and UI/UX stunning application.

Skilled Android Developer with over 5 years of experience in developing applications using Java and Kotlin. Someone who has a passion for staying up-to-date with all new technologies, constantly seeking to explore and take advantage of the latest advancements in the Android Framework. Committed to delivering robust, user-friendly, and scalable applications. A fast learner with an ability to adapt quickly to new technologies and a strong focus for code quality and best practices.
Changing the layout system will result in a full reboot of the app. Are you sure you want to continue?
Dynamic colors (a.k.a. Material You) is only available for Android phones with version 12 or higher. If possible, please update to use this setting.
